title: Banned account
body: My account have banned for litteraly nothing. I haven't said anyhting bad last 3 games or more. I will be really happy if someone help me.

replies.body: Looks like the ban was placed concerning billing issues. If you still need that context of what happened, feel free to shoot our Billing agents a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).
